about-us.title: Your partner in electricity, offering reliable and sustainable solutions.
about-us.paragraph: We offer electrical services tailored to your needs, whether for residential, commercial, or industrial projects.

projects.label: Projects
projects.title: Discover our latest projects
projects.paragraph: See how we combine innovation and expertise to create unique designs and functional spaces.

catalogues.label: Catalogs
catalogues.title: Browse our catalogs
catalogues.paragraph: Discover our wide selection of products and services to find the perfect solutions for your needs.

wemmel.description: A heartfelt project combining quality and innovation, bringing a unique and captivating design that catches everyone's attention.

pont.description: A unique transformation bringing a modern and distinctive design to this apartment, combining elegance and functionality to create an exceptional living space.

categories.title: Our Categories
categories.description: Browse our categories to find exactly what you are looking for.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.description: We collaborate with top partners to offer you the best products and services.

shop.title: Shop
shop.description: Discover our collection of quality products available for online purchase.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest news and offers.

start.title: How it all started
start.description: Building a sustainable business that combines expertise, passion, and family values while leaving a legacy inspired by its children.
start.story: With over 14 years of experience in the electrical field, our story is one of constant progression: from employee to associate, then independent, leading to the creation of this company that brings together all these years of work and dedication. Our founder,
start.storyContinued: turned his dream into reality through constant effort and passion for his profession.
start.companyNamePart2: carries deep personal significance, inspired by his two children: Mathias ('Mati') and Eunice ('Onis'). Thus, every completed project reflects this emotional connection.

cold.title: Refrigeration techniques:
cold.description: Professional maintenance and installation services for equipment such as air conditioning, heat pumps, and other related systems, supported by qualifications like
cold.additionalDetails: and the status of certified refrigeration technician.

additional.title: Other services:
additional.description: Plumbing, heating, controlled mechanical ventilation (CMV), carpentry, and much more.

about.conclusion: All our services are carried out to high standards of professionalism, with a focus on quality and personalized solutions to turn our clients' dreams into concrete projects.

signIn.title: Sign In
signIn.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.

signUp.title: Don't have an account yet?
signUp.subtitle: Sign up for free and enjoy your benefits.
signUp.firstnameMinLength: First name must be at least 3 characters.
signUp.lastnameMinLength: Last name must be at least 3 characters.
signUp.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
signUp.passwordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.

list.name: John Doe
list.feedback: The construction materials are of exceptional quality! Delivery was quick and the team was very professional.

list.name: Jane Smith
list.feedback: I bought construction tools and the quality is spot on. Very satisfied with the products, highly recommend!

list.name: Sam Wilson
list.feedback: Excellent experience with construction material supply. The customer service is great and the delivery was on time. A trusted partner.

list.name: Sarah Lee
list.feedback: The construction equipment I purchased is perfect for my site. Easy to use and very durable. Thanks for the quality!
